name: ui-predicate-meta
description: Finally a predicate UI component for the Web

scripts.postpublish: npm run --silent build:website && git add docs/* && git commit -m 'update website'
scripts.build:website: npm run --silent build:docs && npm run --silent build:examples
scripts.build:examples: npx lerna exec "ROOT=../../docs/packages/\$LERNA_PACKAGE_NAME/\`node -e \"console.log(require('./package.json').version)\"\`&& mkdir -v -p ../../docs/packages/\$ROOT/examples && parcel build examples/index.html --public-url ./ --no-cache --no-minify -d \$ROOT/examples/  -t browser --detailed-report"

author: Francois-Guillaume Ribreau <npm@fgribreau.com> (http://fgribreau.com/)
